name: Outside Flower
tags: Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,Office Workers,Drama,School Life,Slice of Life
nutshell:
"Mister, are you a virgin?"
Masamoto, a 29-year-old guy. He has serious problems relating to people, in addition to being single. But, to change that, one day he decides to go to a gay meeting place and get a date. But, while he was hesitating whether to go in or not, a high school student appears who seems to be lost, Sakuya, and he catches his eye. This action immediately caused him to run away from the place. But one day, the two of them meet again at the cinema. After talking for a while, both realize that they have similar tastes. But then, Sakuya-san says he'll help Masamoto get a partner…?!

name: Pokémon Special
nutshell:
Pokémon Adventures follows the story of the original Game Boy game, with all the Gym Leaders, places and opponents. There's plenty of action as these trainers explore forests, jungles, cities and caves in search of Pokémon and adventure… sometimes working together, sometimes on their own! But can they foil the schemes of Team Rocket, a mysterious group of villains who want to use Pokémon for evil?
Volume 1 Chapter 1 - Volume 3 Chapter 40 - Red, Green & Blue chapter
Volume 4 Chapter 41 - Volume 7 Chapter 90 - Yellow chapter

name: Plainwalker of the Stigma
nutshell:
Talented Engineering Professor ‘Wi Geonwoo’ was
fired from the research center he worked at all his life and was kidnapped by a mystifying light, only to be dropped into a mysterious world. Engineering Professor Wi Geonwoo was approached by an entity that called himself “A God With No Face” and was forcibly given a blue stigma.
In this new world, individuals with blue stigmas are hunted, while the ones with red or crimson stigmas are considered the hunters who seek out their prey.
Will ‘Wi Geonwoo’ with his blue stigma, be able to survive as one of the hunted?
“I will be your strength, so lend me your body.”
To make matters worse, ‘Ash Glaive,” a strange slime-like individual appeared. Together with Archmage Ash, and the imagination and monster-like bodies of the engineers, they start the war against the red stigmas.

name: My Mom's a Superstar
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Girls' Love,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: What will happen when an overly-supportive daughter discovers loads of photos of her mom, a famous actress, on the internet posing with her female co-stars in ways that "friends" would not do?

name: GT-giRl
nutshell: Set in a future where autonomous cars are ubiquitous, Hinata Satou attends Mihama Girls' High School, and aspires to establish and run a racing club to participate in the JGTC-W. A racing championship where other all girls' schools compete with their tuned cars. She encounters Yuri Yamamoto, an aspiring e-sports pro, and recruits Yuri as a driver despite her inexperience. Together with the rest of the Mihama girls, they take on the JGTC-W and Yuri learns about what makes racing so captivating.

name: Boku no Kanojo ga Majime Sugiru Shojo Bitch na Ken
nutshell: When high school student Shinozaki confesses his feelings to the beautiful and aloof class representative, Akiho Kosaka, the last thing he expected was for her to say "yes." Like everything else in her diligent life, Kosaka takes dating quite seriously. In an effort to be a good girlfriend, Kosaka decides to meticulously study (and bluntly suggest) all manner of ways to keep Shinozaki sexually satisfied in the theoretical sense, that is. This innocently lewd relationship is only just the beginning.

name: Apollo's Song
nutshell:
Apollo´s Song follows the tragic journey of Shogo, a young man whose abusive childhood has instilled in him a loathing for love so profound he finds himself compelled to acts of violence when he is witness to any act of intimacy or affection whether by human or beast. His hate is such that the gods intervene, cursing Shogo to experience love throughout the ages ultimately to have it ripped from his heart every time. From the Nazi atrocities of World War II to a dystopian future of human cloning, Shogo loses his heart, in so doing, healing the psychic scars of his childhood hatred.
Official English

Volumes 35-37 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Burning Effect
nutshell:
This story is about the fierce struggle between law enforcement and those who want to upset the world.
In the Cᵗʰ century, the central bureau of the municipality, Graymark, sentence anyone to death, regardless of the severity of the offense in order to reduce the crime rate and population in proportion to the increased life expectancy due to medical advances.
This is a conflict between the Central Bureau and the Revolutionary Army trying to overturn this system.
[right]

name: Boku to Kanojo no Ikkagetsu
nutshell: A ten page story about a guy that's trying to find something important to him.

name: Manga Biology
nutshell:
Tezuka teaches about biology in short chapters.
(from ebookjapan):
"Oh, yes, my name is Dr. Nandemo Kandemo, the instructor of this class. Hey there, don't look away from me. Today's topics are biology and astronomy. They are sure to be interesting and informative.
Let the lecture begin!"

Volume 279 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: The Demon King's Daughter Is Way Too Easy
nutshell: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?

name: Miss Angel and Miss Devil
nutshell: The story of angels who don't behave like angels and devils who are kinder than them. A new romance begins!

name: Let's Make My Tall Girlfriend Wear Cute Clothes!
The Girls in the Entire Cultivation World Want to Catch Me
nutshell: I, Xia Yi, have an Innate Tao Body that allows me to understand myriad methods and improve any girl's constitution as long as I dual cultivate with them. But what happens when you're someone with an Innate Tao Body and haven't become a powerhouse yet? Naturally, you'll be kidnapped and serve as a cultivation furnace for your kidnapper!

name: Aragae! Dark Elf-chan
nutshell: A dark elf who was rampaging on the continent was defeated by the stoic swordsman Crow. She was prepared to die, but for some reason, Crow suddenly decided to bring her home and look after her... ?!

name: I Won't Be Breaking Off This Engagement. You Know That, Right?
nutshell:
"Ah… Ahhhhhhhhhhh!"
The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea, but during their first meeting, she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that, is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me!
This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path, and will fight to change her fate.

name: I Just Had to Pick up a Female Disciple
nutshell: On my path in cultivation to reach immortality, I had only wanted a female disciple. But this disciple may have something to do with my wife of my previous life!

name: Dreaming Freedom
nutshell:
Jungmin Choi is severely bullied in high school because of a fallout with her childhood best friend Joohyun Ha. Her only solace comes from tormenting Joohyun in her ‘lucid dreams’ where no one can disturb her. One day, she meets a mysterious man in her lucid dream who offers her to get revenge on the people tormenting her…

Links:

Official Indonesian Translation
Official Simplified Chinese Translation

name: Kanojo no Kagi wo Akeru Houhou
nutshell: Haruma's first impression of the new transfer student, Chitose, would be striped panties. Running into her in the hallway, Chitose's panties greet Haruma before they even know each other. Immediately, Haruma finds himself attracted to this mysterious panty girl, only to find out that she is transfering into his class AND she's going to be the new house keeper at his apartment. Let the skirt flying romance comedy begin.

name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Yuuutsu
nutshell: Kyon is your ordinary high school freshman who has long given up on his childhood dreams of encountering the fantastic and supernatural…or so he thought. From the very first day of school, his classmate–the beautiful but eccentric Haruhi Suzumiya–makes it very clear that her only desire is to meet aliens, time travelers, and psychics! A chance conversation between the two inspires Haruhi to form the SOS Brigade, a school club created for the sole purpose of getting these supernatural beings together. The initial members consist of the mute bookworm Yuki Nagato, the timid but voluptuous Mikuru Asahina, and the polite and ever-smiling Itsuki Koizumi. By the end of this first volume, Kyon quickly finds out that these seemingly “helpless victims” of Haruhi’s are actually members of secret organizations–both futuristic and alien–keeping watch over Haruhi as she is the pinnacle of some major calamity on the horizon…

name: The Ladykiller in Another World
nutshell: A Shoujo hero gets isekai'd to a fantasy world and is tasked with smiting the Demon King.

name: Koi Koi Country Road
nutshell:
From Manga Abyss:
Having just transferred to a rural school, somehow he got engaged. Also, he suddenly attacked a girl at a rural ceremony….?!

name: Midori's Secret
nutshell: "The special you, whom only I know." A short and sweet love story published in the Dessert Magazine Issue of 2022.

name: Shinkuro - Hairikomu Zaiakukan
nutshell: Ever since they were little, twins Itsuka and Rika could see what others could not. At first, they believed that they were seeing ghosts and spirits, but when they turned 14 they realized everything. They realized that what they saw was the depiction of regret and self-disgust in people who know that they did something wrong. They see these disturbing images whether they wanted to or not, so in many cases their curiosity leads them into trouble. In every case, these two try to bring peace to the person who holds the dark secrets.

name: Sora o Daite Oyasumi
nutshell: On the school rooftop rumored to be haunted by the ghosts of twins, Shuji Yashiro meets Roku Ichinose, a popular boy Shuji always thought of as belonging to a completely different social world. Unable to take his eyes off Roku's face, Shuji takes his picture on impulse. The following day, while organizing old photos in the clubroom, Shuji finds a shocking photograph that unexpectedly brings his world a little closer to Ichinose's…

name: Renai Junkie - 100% Fresh Juice (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Renai Junkie dj
Main characters are Haruki's (from Renai Junkie) elder brothers.

2,4) Yellow


Kotobukiinari


Aitsu to Ore dj - Newly-wed

name: Rental Kareshi ni Hiru mo Yoru mo Moteasobaretemasu!?
nutshell:
Yuu pretends he can't have a girlfriend because he has a secret he can't tell anyone - he likes boys.
But before he gets busy studying for exams, he wants some dating experience!
Yuu takes the plunge and applies for a rental boyfriend. On the day of the date, his rental boyfriend - Makoto, was surprised to see a boy and whispered: "I like your face." Yuu keeps getting distracted by his words and behaviors.
It makes Yuu wonder... what's Makoto's real identity?

name: Ayashiya
nutshell: This is a story of demons and humans occupying the same world. Jin, second generation head of the draper Ayashiya family, to strike back against his enemy, satiates the appetite of the demon-soul eating demon Damari. To regain his power and memories, they hunt demons.

name: Starting From Today I'll Work as a City Lord
nutshell: When a gaming otaku gains the power to cross over to other worlds, he will obviously have to figure out what to do with it! But what is this?! A domineering cat-woman elder sister, a loli fox-woman, a cuddly rabbit-woman younger sister… This isn't a zoo! Welcome to a world where the strong prey on the weak. Then again, it's all so wonderful! An authentic strategy game, a huge conspiracy crisis, this other world's hegemony is now loading, all waiting for thou scum…

name: Haikyuu!! - Empty (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Hinata and Kageyama discuss how they feel about each other – which should be a lot easier than it is proving for two people dating one another.
